content:
# I have successfully extracted 1 more stone brick, bringing my total to 7 stone bricks in inventory. 
# The furnace currently has no ingredients to smelt and is left with only 1 stone.

# To keep production going, I need to gather more stone. I will head to the nearest stone resource again and collect more.

stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Locate the nearest stone resource
move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the stone resource position
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Collect more stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting stone.
